org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Class ComputeDriverProvisioningAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseComputeDriver
      org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.ComputeDriverProvisioningAdapter

public final class ComputeDriverProvisioningAdapter
extends BaseComputeDriver

Adapter class from the deprecated cloud driver interface to the new compute driver base class.

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
barakme

Method Detail

create

public static BaseComputeDriver create(Object driverInstance)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
Factory method for a compute driver. If the object extends the new Base Compute Drive class, returns the object. If the object implements the older, deprecated, Provisioning Driver interface, returns an adapter around it. Otherwise, throws an exception

Parameters:
driverInstance - an instance of the actual driver class.
Returns:
a Compute Driver that extends the base compute driver.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the input does not extend BaseComputeDriver or implements ProvisioningDriver.

getComputeContext

public Object getComputeContext()
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
A compute driver may choose to give access to the internal 'context' which is used to communicate with the cloud API. This is an optional interface, and defaults to returning null.

Overrides:
getComputeContext in class BaseComputeDriver
Returns:
Compute context object or null if not set.

onServiceUninstalled

public void onServiceUninstalled(long duration,
                                 TimeUnit unit)
                          throws InterruptedException,
                                 TimeoutException,
                                 CloudProvisioningException
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Called after service has uninstalled. Used to implement cloud resource cleanup for this service.

Overrides:
onServiceUninstalled in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
duration - time to wait for the shutdown operation.
unit - time unit for the shutdown operations
Throws:
InterruptedException - If the operation was interrupted.
TimeoutException - If the operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the operation encountered an error.

startMachine

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails startMachine(ProvisioningContext context,
                                                                              long duration,
                                                                              TimeUnit unit)
                                                                       throws TimeoutException,
                                                                              CloudProvisioningException
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Starts an additional machine on the cloud , on the specific location, to scale out this specific service. In case of an error while provisioning the machine, any allocated resources should be freed before throwing a CloudProvisioningException or TimeoutException to the caller.

Overrides:
startMachine in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
context - the provisioning context for this machine.
duration - Time duration to wait for the instance.
unit - Time unit to wait for the instance.
Returns:
The details of the started instance.
Throws:
TimeoutException - In case the instance was not started in the allotted time.
CloudProvisioningException - If a problem was encountered while starting the machine.

stopMachine

public boolean stopMachine(String machineIp,
                           long duration,
                           TimeUnit unit)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           TimeoutException,
                           CloudProvisioningException
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Stops a specific machine for scaling in or shutting down a specific service.

Overrides:
stopMachine in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
machineIp - host-name/IP of the machine to shut down.
duration - time to wait for the shutdown operation.
unit - time unit for the shutdown operations
Returns:
true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.
Throws:
InterruptedException - If the operation was interrupted.
TimeoutException - If the operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the operation encountered an error.

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] startManagementMachines(ManagementProvisioningContext context,
                                                                                           long duration,
                                                                                           TimeUnit unit)
                                                                                    throws TimeoutException,
                                                                                           CloudProvisioningException
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Start the management machines for this cluster. This method is called once by the cloud administrator when bootstrapping a new cluster.

Overrides:
startManagementMachines in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
context - the provisioning context for this request.
duration - timeout duration.
unit - timeout unit.
Returns:
The created machine details.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If creating the new machines exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the machines needed for management could not be provisioned.

Parameters:

Returns:
the existing management servers, or a 0-length array if non exist.
Throws:
